summary: The ViTFeatureExtractor class encapsulates the preprocessing pipeline required to convert raw image inputs into the normalized tensor format expected by Vision Transformer (ViT) models, handling tasks such as resizing, cropping, channel scaling, and mean‑std normalization.
business_intent: Enable downstream computer‑vision applications—such as image classification, object detection, or visual feature indexing—to reliably feed images into ViT architectures without manual preprocessing, thereby streamlining model deployment and inference workflows.
